column1: # Performance Monitoring Events for Intel(R) Xeon(R) processor E5 family and Intel(R) Xeon(R) processor E7 family Based on the Ivy Bridge-EP Microarchitecture - V17
# Copyright (c) 2007 - 2014 Intel Corporation. All rights reserved.

column5: DESCRIPTION
Counts demand data reads
Counts all demand data writes (RFOs)
Counts all demand code reads
Counts core writebacks due to L2 evictions or L1 writeback requests
Counts prefetch (that bring data to L2) data reads
Counts all prefetch (that bring data to L2) RFOs
Counts all prefetch (that bring data to LLC only) code reads
Counts all prefetch (that bring data to LLC only) data reads
Counts all prefetch (that bring data to LLC only) RFOs
Counts prefetch (that bring data to LLC only) code reads
Counts any other requests
Counts all prefetch data reads
Counts prefetch RFOs
Counts all prefetch code reads
Counts all demand & prefetch data reads
Counts all demand & prefetch RFOs
Counts all demand & prefetch code reads
Counts all data/code/rfo reads (demand & prefetch)
Counts all requests
hit in the LLC
hit in the LLC and sibling core snoops are not needed as either the core-valid bit is not set or the shared line is present in multiple cores
hit in the LLC and the snoops sent to sibling cores return clean response
hit in the LLC and the snoops to sibling cores hit in either E/S state and the line is not forwarded
hit in the LLC and the snoop to one of the sibling cores hits the line in M state and the line is forwarded
miss in the LLC
miss the LLC and the data returned from local dram
miss the LLC and the data returned from local or remote dram
